last_episode_to_air.name: It Couldn't Last Forever (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: The IHP class graduates, with T.J. as valedictorian. (Part 2 of 2, and series finale)

name: Head of the Class
overview:
Head of the Class is an American sitcom that ran from 1986 to 1991 on the ABC television network.

The series follows a group of gifted students in the Individualized Honors Program at the fictional Monroe High School in Manhattan, and their history teacher Charlie Moore. The program was ostensibly a vehicle for Hesseman, best known for his role as radio DJ Dr. Johnny Fever in the sitcom WKRP in Cincinnati. Hesseman left Head of the Class in 1990 and was replaced by Billy Connolly as teacher Billy MacGregor for the final season. After the series ended, Connolly appeared in a short-lived spin-off titled Billy.

The series was created and executive produced by Rich Eustis and Michael Elias. Rich Eustis had previously worked as a New York City substitute teacher while hoping to become an actor.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: A high school substitute teacher takes over a class of geniuses.

episodes.name: Back to the Future
episodes.overview: The class imagines life 20 years in the future

episodes.name: Charliegate
episodes.overview: Dennis misquotes Mr. Moore for the school newspaper

episodes.name: Love at First Byte
episodes.overview: Charlie receives a love note from a secret admirer he suspects is in the IHP.

episodes.name: The Outsider
episodes.overview: Janice feels left out in class and decides to throw a party to make friends.  Charlie dates a model.

episodes.name: Teacher's Teacher
episodes.overview: Charlie is upset when the IHP's regular teacher announces his return from sick leave.

episodes.name: Volleyball Anyone?
episodes.overview: Arvid tries to impress a girl by challenging the school basketball players to a volleyball match against the IHP class.

episodes.name: Critical Choices
episodes.overview: Charlie tries his hand at ""Hamlet""

episodes.name: Cold Turkey
episodes.overview: Mr. Moore spends Thanksgiving with Dr. Samuels

episodes.name: You've Got a Friend
episodes.overview: After their team project wins them a trip to Washington, D.C., Sarah and Arvid develop slight feelings for each other. But things aren't necessarily a bed of roses between them.

episodes.name: As Time Goes By
episodes.overview: Charlie's ex-flame evaluates the class

episodes.name: The Way We Weren't
episodes.overview: When doing reports on their ancestry, both Alan and Darlene find things out that they don't want to.

episodes.name: Rebel Without a Class
episodes.overview: Eric makes trouble for another teacher

episodes.name: Ode to Simone
episodes.overview: Simone receives a discouraging letter from her favorite poet....after his death.  Dennis tries to give up sarcasm and pranks.

episodes.name: Past Imperfect
episodes.overview: Charlie must pass a test in Macro Economics in order to keep his teaching license. The IHP attempt to help him.

episodes.name: A Problem Like Maria
episodes.overview: Maria dates the captain of the opposing team

episodes.name: The Russians Are Coming, the Russians Are Coming!
episodes.overview: The IHP faces their Russian counterparts in an academic tournament.  Eric must join the team to replace an ailing Jawaharal.

episodes.name: Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: The class has problems on Valentine's day.

episodes.name: Video Activity
episodes.overview: The class makes a music video for a time capsule

episodes.name: Privilege
episodes.overview: Charlie sets Arvid up with a job at a hot nightclub, which causes Arvid to develop a cocky, image-conscious attitude.

episodes.name: The Secret Life of Arvid Engen
episodes.overview: Arvid starts to daydream about Lori and it affects his schoolwork

episodes.name: Science Fair-Weather Friends
episodes.overview: Sarah, Arvid, and Dennis compete and deceive to win the science fair.

episodes.name: The Write Stuff
episodes.overview: Charlie encourages the class to revitalize the school's literary journal, and the class votes Simone as editor-in-chief. Unfortunately, the power this position gives Simone slightly goes to her head. Meanwhile, Eric fabricates a memoir for the journal, which dishonestly wins him more attention from Simone.

episodes.name: The Big Squeeze
episodes.overview: The IHP are concerned when they learn a transfer student might join their class, making it necessary for one of them to leave. They fight over who it should be.

episodes.name: Child of the 60's
episodes.overview: Dennis holds a sit-in for better cafeteria food after Charlie teaches a lesson on the rebelliousness of the '60s.

episodes.name: Trouble in Perfectville
episodes.overview: The class puts out a lampoon issuse of the school newspaper

episodes.name: Coach Charlie
episodes.overview: When Dr. Samuels is ejected from the meets, he gets Mr. Moore to take his place as coach.

episodes.name: That'll Be the Day
episodes.overview: The class puts on Grease

episodes.name: Poltergeist III
episodes.overview: Janice says there is a poltergeist following her and soon the class begins to believe her.

episodes.name: Psyched Out at Fillmore
episodes.overview: The class takes a standardized personality test and then worry about the results.

episodes.name: Play it Again, Woody
episodes.overview: Charlie and Arvid reflect on their love woes at a Woody Allen marathon going on at a movie theater.

episodes.name: Will the Real Arvid Engen Please Stand Up?
episodes.overview: Arvid sends his penpal Eric's picture

episodes.name: On the Road Again
episodes.overview: Darlene and Sarah buy a car; problems with Mrs. Samuels has Dr. Samuels rooming with Charlie.

episodes.name: Cello Fever
episodes.overview: Janice tries to get first chair in the school orchestra

episodes.name: Parent's Day
episodes.overview: The IHP's parent's come to see how the class is taught

episodes.name: Love is Debatable
episodes.overview: Darlene pretends to like Alan to win debates

episodes.name: For Better, For Worse
episodes.overview: Ms. Meara teaches a class on marriage

episodes.name: We Love You, Mrs. Russell
episodes.overview: A popular teacher has Alzheimer's

episodes.name: Don't Play With Matches
episodes.overview: The class gets matched up with computer dates

episodes.name: The 21st-Century News
episodes.overview: Dennis sees a bleak future

episodes.name: Moore Than You Know
episodes.overview: Charlie thinks he sees his dead uncle

episodes.name: The Refrigerator of Fillmore High
episodes.overview: Dennis gets to play on the football team.

episodes.name: Mission to Moscow (1)
episodes.overview: In Moscow, Dr. Samuels insists on study for an academic meet, while Charlie lobbies for more personal cultural experiences. (Part 1 of 2)

episodes.name: Mission to Moscow (2)
episodes.overview: The team begins the competition without Eric, Arvid or Dennis.

episodes.name: Let's Rap
episodes.overview: The class become Peer Counselors

episodes.name: Engen and Son
episodes.overview: Arvid's Dad teaches the honor's math class.

episodes.name: Get a Job
episodes.overview: Dennis gets a job as a waiter to help pay off debts.

episodes.name: Born to Run
episodes.overview: Alan and Sarah both want to be class president

episodes.name: First Date
episodes.overview: Eric and Simone go on their first date.

episodes.name: Partners
episodes.overview: Maria hides her intelligence from a hunk she is dating

episodes.name: Arvid's Sure Thing
episodes.overview: Arvid goes out with an easy girl

episodes.name: Scuttlebutt
episodes.overview: An accomplished journalist alumnus visits.

episodes.name: Little Shop 'Til You Drop (1)
episodes.overview: The final days before opening night are fraught with chaos: no Ronette, Mr. Mushnik MIA, one lead with laryngitis and another ready to walk just before curtain time.

episodes.name: The Hot Seat
episodes.overview: The girls don't like their gym teacher, but she likes Charlie

episodes.name: Radio Activity
episodes.overview: Charlie's efforts to broaden the audience and membership of the school's radio club tune out the original fans - and its only member.

episodes.name: The Little Sister
episodes.overview: Janice takes Dennis to small claims court for a ruined blouse; Charlie falls for Dr. Samuels sister.

episodes.name: I Am the King
episodes.overview: Charlie moonlights as a character in late night commercials for an appliance store.

episodes.name: King of Remedial
episodes.overview: Fed up with Dennis' constant gags, Charlie shows him the door - to a remedial-history class, where Denn becomes the inspirational leader for an acade meet the IHP kids.

episodes.name: Labor Daze
episodes.overview: The staff, including Charlie, go on strike

episodes.name: Exactly Twelve O'Clock
episodes.overview: Hall monitor Arvid has daytime nightmares of a personal high noon after a bully he cited for loitering demands a showdown - at high noon.

episodes.name: Back to School
episodes.overview: It's the first day back at School and there are some new additions to Mr. Moore's class. Maria, transferred to the High Of Perfoming Arts, Jawarlahal's family moved to California, and Janice went Harvard. The new kids are coming in, Alex Torres, Aristotle McKenzie, and Viki Armory, who has crushes on her teachers.

episodes.name: Viki & Eric & Simone & Alex
episodes.overview: Eric goes out with Viki and Simone goes out with Alex and they all end up at the art museum.

episodes.name: The Ring of Darlene M.
episodes.overview: Certain members of the class suspect Alex of stealing Darlene's antique ring.

episodes.name: Viki in Love
episodes.overview: Viki believes she is in love with Mr. Moore, but Alan believes she loves him.

episodes.name: Blunden in Love
episodes.overview: Dennis falls for a girl, then later finds out that she is homeless.

episodes.name: The Bright Stuff (1)
episodes.overview: Arvid and Dennis's science project makes it into the NASA finals in Houston. (Part 1 of 2)

episodes.name: Gotta Dance
episodes.overview: Arvid replaces T.J. as Alex's dance partner.

episodes.name: Good Mourning
episodes.overview: Charlie teaches the class about grief.

episodes.name: Arvid Nose Best
episodes.overview: Arvid considers having his nose surgically repaired to stop his snoring and to look better

episodes.name: The Devil and Miss T.J.
episodes.overview: T.J. makes a deal with the devil to get accepted into the IHP class.

episodes.name: Why Ronnie Can't Read
episodes.overview: The IHP students help the school's star athlete prepare for his college entrance exams.

episodes.name: The Joker Is Wild
episodes.overview: T.J.'s first assignment as the newest member of IHP is ridiculed by Dennis.

episodes.name: Tough Guys Don't Sew
episodes.overview: Viki gets Eric to design and sew clothes for her home economics project.

episodes.name: Alan Goes Crimson
episodes.overview: Alan thinks he is getting early admission to Harvard. When he finds out he won't be getting that, he tries to apologize for remarks he said.

episodes.name: From Hair to Eternity (1)
episodes.overview: The prudish head of the school's English department seems determined to ruin Charlie's class production of ""Hair"". (Part 1 of 2)

episodes.name: From Hair to Eternity (2)
episodes.overview: The spirit of ""Hair"" leads the class to go on with the show in defiance of Mrs Hartman. (Part 2 of 2)

episodes.name: Recruitment Day
episodes.overview: The class worries about college recruiters

episodes.name: The Quiet Kid
episodes.overview: A new student rejects the Academic Olympics.

episodes.name: Simone Goes Overboard
episodes.overview: Simone agrees to date Dennis after he saves her from drowning.

episodes.name: Queen, Queen, Queen for a Day
episodes.overview: Arvid takes three girls to the same dance

episodes.name: The Reel Charlie Moore
episodes.overview: Aristotle tries to help Charlie's acting career.

episodes.name: Cement Hi-Tops
episodes.overview: Aristotle videotapes a mob family wedding.

episodes.name: Teacher's Pet
episodes.overview: Charlie and Eric vie for a night-school teacher.

episodes.name: Where's Charlie?
episodes.overview: Charlie doesn't return for the new school year and the Kids are wondering where's Charlie? Charlie found an acting gig and left and now the students have a new teacher, Billy MacGregor.

episodes.name: Twelve Angry Nerds
episodes.overview: When Alan is caught cheating, Billy has the class act as a jury to decide his punishment.

episodes.name: The Heartbreak Nerd
episodes.overview: Arvid goes out with gorgeous Viki.

episodes.name: And Then There Were None
episodes.overview: Arvid's infectious flu may keep the class from performing in a Shakespeare competition.

episodes.name: Getting Personal
episodes.overview: Billy tries the personals ads.

episodes.name: Napoleon Blown Apart
episodes.overview: Inspired by his French class, Eric goes to ""find himself"" in Paris.

episodes.name: Billy's Big One
episodes.overview: Billy fakes a heart attack to circumvent a health-insurance bureaucrasy; the IHP girls try writing a romance novel.

episodes.name: Dead Men Don't Wear Pocket Protectors (1)
episodes.overview: After Billy is robbe, he has the class write papers on gun control, leading Arvid to a harrowing experience when he buys a gun for the assignment. (Part 1 of 2)

episodes.name: Dead Men Don't Wear Pocket Protectors (2)
episodes.overview: Bully Zach may have Arvid's missing gun. (Part 2 of 2)

episodes.name: Fillmore vs. Billy Jean's
episodes.overview: The IHP class behaves obnoxiously when their bus breaks down at a rural truck stop.

episodes.name: Be My Baby . . . Sitter
episodes.overview: Jasper's overprotective parents hire a babysitter for him -- and to his mortification, it turns out to be Sarah.

episodes.name: Dancing Fools
episodes.overview: Billy and Bernadette take dance lessons at the studio where Alex teaches, and where he's pursued by a woman.

episodes.name: My Son the Primate
episodes.overview: Arvid trains a chimp at his part-time pet store job and, rather than let it be sold, hides it in the classroom.

episodes.name: The Importance of Being Alex
episodes.overview: Simone's reputation suffers when Alex lies to his friends about a romance with her.

episodes.name: Viki's Torn Genes
episodes.overview: At Christmas, Billy helps Viki find her birth mother, but the woman doesn't want to see her.

episodes.name: The Last Waltz
episodes.overview: T.J. turns down Aristotle's invitation to the senior prom.

episodes.name: Most Likely to Be Forgotten
episodes.overview: The kids work on their yearbook, with Eric beginning to regret not having participated more extracurricularly.

episodes.name: The Strange Case of Randy McNally
episodes.overview: To save Dennis after a prank, Billy creates a fictional student -- who apparently gets the MIT scholarship Dennis wanted.

episodes.name: My Dinner With Darlene
episodes.overview: Darlene promises to treat the class to an elaborate farewell dinner, but then finds her credit card revoked.

episodes.name: The Phantom of the Glee Club
episodes.overview: The class learns T.J. is more than just a contemporary-style musician when Billy discovers her operatic talent.

episodes.name: It Couldn't Last Forever (1)
episodes.overview: With a wrecking ball ready to demolish the school, the IHP class waits to fund out who's to be valedictorian. (Part 1 of 2)

episodes.name: It Couldn't Last Forever (2)
episodes.overview: The IHP class graduates, with T.J. as valedictorian. (Part 2 of 2, and series finale)
